<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> High Command

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Get group icon properties.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> group '''getGroupIcon''' ID

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> group: [[Group]] -

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> ID: [[Number]] -

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>_grpIconId = _group getVariable "BIS_MARTA_ICON_TYPE";
_grpIcon = _group getGroupIcon _grpIconId;</inner><close></pre></close></ext>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addGroupIcon]], [[clearGroupIcons]], [[getGroupIconParams]], [[groupIconSelectable]], [[groupIconsVisible]], [[onGroupIconClick]], [[removeGroupIcon]], [[setGroupIcon]], [[setGroupIconParams]], [[setGroupIconsSelectable]], [[setGroupIconsVisible]]
</value></part></template>
